description: Delete a project transport plan event
permissions: User must be authorized for the related project transport plan (delegated via the project transport plan; access is based on project access or being an active driver on the plan).
side_effects: Deletes the project transport plan event and also removes associated event times, location predictions, and the location prediction autopsy.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (project transport plan event ID). --confirm must be set to delete.

flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be true to proceed with deletion.
